summary: A context manager that creates a named step‑trace event for the JAX profiler, spanning the execution of the enclosed code block. It can attach a step identifier and appears in TensorBoard and device timelines, providing per‑step performance data.
business_intent: Allow developers to annotate iterative code sections (such as training loops) with lightweight markers so the profiler can deliver detailed timing and resource usage for each step, facilitating performance tuning and debugging.
